name: Dead Drop Methods
description: Techniques for covert information exchange using hidden physical locations.

cards.title: Brush Pass and Live Drops
cards.description: Executing rapid, undetectable exchanges in public settings.
bulletpoints: Use crowd density and movement to mask exchanges
Deploy synchronized gestures and inconspicuous signals
Plan timed encounters to avoid unwanted attention
cards.summaryText: Exploit crowd flow with prearranged cues and tight timing so live drops vanish in plain sight.

cards.title: Container Concealment and Dead Drop Locations
cards.description: Hiding sensitive materials in secure yet accessible locations.
bulletpoints: Use magnetic compartments and false-bottom containers
Identify high-traffic but low-security dead drop locations
Develop retrieval and monitoring strategies to avoid detection
cards.summaryText: Cache materials in disguised containers at busy-yet-unwatched spots and schedule stealthy retrieval sweeps.
